channel.title: 06/07 based server
channel.description:
Looking to create not a remake but either an 06 or and 07 based server from a semi blank base. I have the base, the vps and the webhost ready to go! I'm not an advanced programmer when it comes to java, but I know what I'm doing client/server/web sided pretty well. If you're even just learning don't hesitate to ask me anything. I'm doing this for learning and for fun purposes only. I may release in the future, but my main goal isn't the $. Just looking to make some friends and have a good experience creating a server.
add my Skype [u][i][b]un.named40[/b][/i][/u] If you're interested at all or have any questions! I'm online a lot and I plan to get a lot done.
Thanks for reading. hope you decide to give it a shot!
